prompts: Create a robotic Pokemon that blends technology with nature, featuring a sleek design.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon with metallic parts and vibrant colors, making it stand out.
Show me an insectoid Pokemon with unique armor and a futuristic vibe, perfect for battles.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a blend of a bug and machine, with bright purple accents.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both speed and strength, featuring sharp metallic claws.
Give me a legendary Pokemon with an advanced tech look, showcasing its battle-ready stance.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique combination of steel and bug types, emphasizing its resilience.
